description: Soft, lightweight and breathable, this bra is amazingly comfortable next to your skin. Designed for medium-impact activities, the Seamless Strappy Bra is lined with warm, moisture-managing merino wool. The stable straps, anatomic cups and strategic knit variations add support and make it a shoo-in for your next run or workout.Outer is made from a supportive blend of nylon and elastane.Lined with merino wool, nylon and spandex for exceptional on-skin comfort.Seamless knit delivers chafe-free comfort and support in key zones.Engineered knit cups with removable padding provide shape and lift.
name: Smartwool Merino Seamless Strappy Bra - Women's
